sentences.english: Why don't you wish on the gargoyle?

sentences.english: Hug the monster. Wrestle your fear into submission.

sentences.english: The wind takes the form of the beast, the Imperial Palace of Beijing Taihe temple has this monster.

sentences.english: Then, I heard big monster started sounding voice sounding.

sentences.english: Every day I see the two-headed monster of tax and red tape.

sentences.english: I only could curse on devil of excuse our hearts with peaceful.

sentences.english: The prince rescued the beautiful maiden from the monster.

sentences.english: The Loch Ness Monster is reputed to inhabit its deep waters.

sentences.english: I sent Gina a postcard with a monster on it yesterday.
